BarPropVisible.summary: The visible read-only property of the interface returns true if the user interface element it represents is visible.
BarPropVisible.value:
A {{jsxref("Boolean")}}, which is true if the top-level window is opened by with the popup feature enabled.Historically this represented whether the interface element used is visible
or not. But for privacy reasons, this no longer represents the actual visibility of each
interface element.
